member.name: T:AudioKorLib.Enums.Track
member.summary: Used to specify which Audio Track to affect.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PlayMusic(System.String)
member.summary: Starts a track that plays music.
member.param: The music asset to be played.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PlayMusic(System.String,AudioKorLib.Enums.Track)
member.summary: Starts a track that plays music.
member.param: The music asset to be played.
The track that will be used.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PauseMusic
member.summary: Pauses music and ambience playing from all tracks.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PauseMusic(AudioKorLib.Enums.Track)

member.param: The track that will be paused.
